title: Developers of Oxford-AstraZeneca Vaccine Tied to UK Eugenics Movement
cleaned_text: In our continuing series exploring sustainable development and the associated Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), we turn our attention to SDG 3 which promises to “ensure healthy lives.” Once again, when we scrutinise this promise it is empty. Through the 2030 Agenda for Universal Health Coverage (UHC2030) it seems that debt-based neocolonialism and oppressive global governance by a global public-private partnership are the real goals.

opengraph.title: Developers of Oxford-AstraZeneca Vaccine Tied to UK Eugenics Movement
opengraph.description: The developers of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine have previously undisclosed ties to the re-named British Eugenics Society as well as other Eugenics-linked institutions like the Wellcome Trust.

tags: with Jonathan Bush (George Bush Sr.’s brother) serving on its corporate advisory board
